r.d: This program reformat and beautify PHP source code files automatically. The program is Open Source and distributed under the terms of PHP Licence. It is written in PHP 5 and has a command line tool.
r.n: Summary: Bug fix release - Bug fix[2301]: Whitespace ommited after 'throw' - Bug fix[2104]: Fixed problems with BSD brace style. - Bug fix: Fixed support for GNU brace style + Extra documentation * Replaced addNewLine + addIndent for addNewLineIndent
